channel.title: Stock market game
channel.description:
Now I play this app called market millionaire which is a simulation of the stock market in real times. The game starts you off when 100k with no stocks. So I invested in apple and lost over 10k. I also had google, gold, and amazon, yet I decided to drop them and invested and two other companies and silver, silver a company my dad told me to try out. The two companies I invested in made me all my money back with 5k extra, while losing money from silver until today. I decide to watch the stocks for a little longer since tomorrow it will be my fourth day on the game, yet I believe I have found two stocks that might go up to $200 a share by next year. The first stock is a energy company which is planing a big launch at the end of this year that will make it one of the biggest clean energy company. The second company has a new owner starting this year and the stock has been going up ever since. Both of this stocks don't even cost more then $2, yet by reading their news update which this app provides it is showing them to be great this coming year.
What do you guys think I should do and if you say invest in apple then I would say hell no apple is a dying stock without Steve Jobs and new ideas.

item.title: Stock market game
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. He may have taken some select ideas from others, but he was an innovator as well.
  2. Almost all ideas these days are recycled.

item.title: Stock market game
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I don’t know much if anything about stocks but the larger the price per stock means it can be more unstable.
If you go for lesser valued shares and research em well the profit margin can be very high although it can be very bad also.
What game are you playing? I want to try it lol

item.title: Stock market game

The two companies I invested in made me all my money back with 5k extra, while losing money from silver until today. Both of this stocks don’t even cost more then $2, yet by reading their news update which this app provides it is showing them to be great this coming year.

apple stock is way too loveing expensive almost 700 per stock, hell no
and people buy usually buy atleast 200
200x700 = 140,000 Now is not the time to buy
Steve Jobs is an innovator but Im pretty sure they can survive on their own.
But I wouldn’t bet on apple because its over 700
Tim cook is good but their products and OS is getting old
They are too careful and unwilling to change.
when ever I use my ipad, sometimes I kinda feel I am still in 2008
they update their products every year with minor changes which i am sad about
Google made a good move with JellyBean but both stock are too much
